title: Epic 17: Ready for 1.0 release
description: All quality gates pass, all epics complete, documentation complete, tested on multiple platforms. Milestone 4 (M4).
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Cannot mark ready for 1.0 while epics for dependencies, queries, maintenance, wiki, installation, and documentation remain open. Also blocked by open polish tasks: tskl-34w.2 (perf gating), tskl-34w.4 (Windows verification), tskl-34w.6 (dogfooding).
